#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= A Skeleton Program using the C API =

A basic plugin must implement three functions:

<pre>
PP_Module g_module_id;
PPB_GetInterface g_get_browser_interface = NULL;

PP_EXPORT int PPP_InitializeModule(PP_Module module_id,
                                   PPB_GetInterface get_browser_interface) {
  // Save the parameters for later.
  g_module_id = module_id;
  g_get_browser_interface = get_browser_interface;

  // Returning 0 indicates success.
  return 0;
}

PP_EXPORT void PPP_ShutdownModule() {
}

PP_EXPORT const void* PPP_GetInterface(const char* interface_name) {
  // You will normally implement a getter for at least PPP_INSTANCE_INTERFACE here.
  return NULL;
}</pre>



= A Skeleton Program using the C++ API =

The C++ API takes care of exporting the three functions above.
